title: Was Eddie Van Halen a chain smoker? - Quora

response.answer_text: Edward Van Halen was definitely a “heavy smoker”. I can’t tell you how many cigarettes he smoked, but I’ve seen estimates of him smoking more than two packs (40 cigarettes) per day, which could be considered “chain smoking”. Vocalist Sammy Hagar said than during practice, he would always have a lit cigarette going in the headstock of his guitar, though sometimes it would burn all the way down with him not puffing it. He also had a history of alcoholism and abused other drugs. Per Esquire interview (linked below) EVH’s DAD gave him his first cigarette at age 12! (Image, below, is a post-cancer EVH with an E-cigarette): Eddie Van Halen: The Esquire Interview
Not sure about a,chain smoker, but my understanding was that he was quite a heavy smoker. He also was heavily involved in adult beverages and mind altering non prescribed drugs.
